mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_event_scenario_data ("result",log_session_id,incident_id,risk_id,scenario_id,update_time,focus_ip,target_ip,conclusion) values (#{result,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{logSessionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{incidentId,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{riskId,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{scenarioId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CAST(#{updateTime} AS timestamp),#{focusIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{targetIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{conclusion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) ON CONFLICT (log_session_id) DO UPDATE SET update_time = EXCLUDED.update_time
